title: Paolo Bacigalupi (ology)
creator: Blue Tyson
description: This book is about the work of science fiction writer Paolo Bacigalupi, and is a companion to the http://paolobacigalupi.blogspot.com website http://paolobacigalupi.blogspot.com and collects the content found at the site. The various entries and elements can also be browsed there. He works often in the near future dystopia subgenre, with the major work being a series of stories set in post-oil Thailand. This is also at Smashwords If you prefer a different format. http://paolobacigalupi.blogspot.com
